course_description: CHEM 203 will focus on the chemistry of organic and organometallic compounds; specifically how the molecular orbital theory can be used to predict structure and properties. This course covers kinetics, mechanisms, and catalysis.
prerequisites: (CHEM 202 or CHEM_OX 202 or CHEM 202Z or CHEM 221 or CHEM_OX 221)  as prerequisite or (CHEM 202 or CHEM_OX 202 or CHEM 202Z) as co-requisite, or equivalent transfer credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 1300, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 1:15-2:45p, Instructor: M. Weinschenk, Status: Open
